name: Keijo Fan Game
description:
A non profit, fan made video game adaption of the manga and anime series Keijo!!!!!!!!, featuring the series fictional sport.

It's stil in early development, so it has bugs (for instance the black square cursor - I'm working on that) and lacks many features (a main menu, more characters, more attacks, etc).

Instructions:

You play as Nozomi; your opponent is Sayaka. Press any mouse button to attack. Press left arrow and right arrow to dodge. Rotate mouse to rotate Nozomi (her butt is always aiming towards your cursor). Up arrow and Down arrow to move forward or backward.

Please send us your feedback to: https://www.facebook.com/Keijo-Fan-Game-2423457628...
